name: Tom Teacher
review: nothing much to see tbh  beside some mountains on the horizon  not worth the money really

review: very good

review: was a great view loved it

name: James Kim
review: i took my children to this place on 25th of june  korea is the only divided nation in the world  picturesque view

review: nice view  north eastern most point in south korea accessible to public

review: unfortunately not so much information in englisch but still interesting

name: Allan Boldt
review: the observation deck is plenty high for a good view   but it is difficult to get a high quality picture through the glass that is dirty or produces glare

review: excellent view of dmz

name: Kibyoung Kim
review: important place to connect with north korea for citizens in south korea where people can see sights of north korea  formerly  people could visit mt  gumgang area in north korea through this place but  has been discontinued at this moment

name: Dillon Webb
review: easy way to kind of get close to dprk  it s nothing like the one north of camp casey

review: extraordinery experience

review: recommend visiting this place

review: very close to north korea  it s not open every day  there was hardly anyone around    original

name: Warren Korges
review: there isn t much of anything to see in n korea  although perhaps that s kind of the point  the beach views are very nice  definitely worth the trip just to say you were at the dmz

name: Jason Roh
review: good experience

name: T 6
review: elevator was down but was worth the climb on top floor to see the view and utilize the hd camera stations

name: Jennifer Gilbert
review: on a clear day  you can see the dmz as well as the rugged north korean landscape

name: SOON CHUL WOO
review: it was a great experience  which all koreans would feel almost the same  people can see the territory of north korea clearly with naked eyes    i wish peaceful reunification of korea would come soon

name: Atsushi Harada
review: an observatory overlooking north korea from the east side  the view of the sea of japan from a hill is superb  you can also see mt  kongo  some of the observatory facilities are under renovation  access is quite poor  so you need to secure a car

name: Roy Whitworth
review: well worth a visit   see the coastline and i to n korea

name: Jeff Sheets
review: very scenic  definitely worth visiting and learning all about that area up near the dmz

name: Frédéric Weber
review: a must see if you are nearby seokcho  beautiful deserted beach with the mount kumgang in the background

name: Pat
review: note  you have to get a pass to cross into the dmz    i dropped a pin for the souvenir shop where you get it  see photos   as you drive north  you ll see signs earlier than you expect for the dmz   that s the store to get your pass   super cool museum at the tower  the big dmz museum was closed for some reason   gorgeous day to see everywhere    the little museum was a great tribute to the kia efforts the rok was undertaken   great view of historic hill 351   an awful place to fight and die during the war   a solemn place to visit and remember to pray for unification on the korean peninsula

name: Zo Zo
review: nice and unique scenery

name: Muhammad Umar Farooq
review: a very nice place to have a sneak peek at de militarized zone  dmz

name: JAE IL Ban
review: interesting place to visit
